SEARCH:
Package ch.zhaw.card2brain.auth

Klasse AuthenticationService

java.lang.Object
ch.zhaw.card2brain.auth.AuthenticationService
@Service public class AuthenticationService extends Object
The AuthenticationService class is a service that handles user registration and authentication. It uses a UserRepository to access user data, a PasswordEncoder to encrypt passwords, a JwtService to generate JSON web tokens, and an AuthenticationManager for authentication. It also uses a UserService to validate user data.
Seit:
28-01-2023

  • Konstruktordetails

    • AuthenticationService

      public AuthenticationService()

  • Methodendetails

    • register

      public AuthenticationResponse register(User user) throws RuntimeException
      This method is used to register a new user. It validates the user data using the UserService.isUserValid(User) method, encrypts the password using the PasswordEncoder, adds the user to the repository using the UserService.addUser(User), and generates a JSON web token using the JwtService.generateToken(User) method.
      Parameter:
      user - The user to register
      Gibt zurück:
      An AuthenticationResponse containing the generated JSON web token
      Löst aus:
      RuntimeException - if the user data is invalid

    • authenticate

      public AuthenticationResponse authenticate(LoginDto loginDto) throws RuntimeException
      This method is used to authenticate a user. It uses the AuthenticationManager.authenticate(Authentication) method to authenticate the user, then retrieves the user from the repository using the UserRepository.findUserByMailAddress(String) method. It then generates a JSON web token using the JwtService.generateToken(User) method.
      Parameter:
      loginDto - A DTO containing the user's email address and password
      Gibt zurück:
      An AuthenticationResponse containing the generated JSON web token
      Löst aus:
      RuntimeException - if the user is not found in the repository
